games.name: NBA 2k24
games.desc: Basketball video game offering authentic action, personalized MyPLAYER options, and competitive gameplay.

games.name: FIFA 24
games.desc: EA Sports FC 24 delivers authentic football action with thousands of players, teams, and leagues in a deep simulation experience.

games.name: Tekken 8
games.desc: Witness the epic clash of the Mishima bloodline in this intense fighting game with groundbreaking visuals and innovative gameplay.

games.name: Rise of the Ronin
games.desc: Forge your path as a masterless samurai in war-torn 19th century Japan, where choices and alliances shape your destiny in this open-world action RPG.
